sentence.Network_en: "The practical work you did for us in Brazil was of great value," he went on condescendingly.
sentence.Network_cn: “你在巴西为我们所做的实际工作非常有价值。”他继续以高人一等的语气说道。

sentence.Network_en: " You want to look out for them things ,'said the officer on the left, condescendingly.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 你要当心这些转弯的地方, " 左边的警察屈尊地说.
他对待自己的秘书很傲慢.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《傲慢与偏见》第四十八章 _新沪江英语网... ... injurious 有害的 condescendingly 谦逊地 vt. 收割,得到报应.
一路笑到伯班克-英语点津 ... 27. thrill: 兴奋，激动。 28. condescendingly: 居高临下地。.
... 曲解四平街战役史料,抹黑中国新民主主义革命.与其降贵纡尊地(condescendingly)邀请外劳与新移民参加「文明之舞」,不如真正地 …
...s......讲的也是华盛顿共识所宣称的内容所造成的影响。所以译文没有什么问题，更谈不上不忠实原文。condescendingly 修改过了，另一个译文中有后面的内容会继续看一下，不过在推敲的时候都需要虚心一些，明显有些问题似乎不在译文。.

list.abs: vt.(treat condescendingly) 居高临下地对待2.
He looked at me very condescendingly and then let out a long sigh ., 他非常傲慢地看了看我 , 然后发出一声长叹.
Talk down to sbbspeak to sb in condescendingly simple language ., 以简单语言屈高就下与某人谈话.
He treats his secretary condescendingly ., 他对待自己的秘书很傲慢.

entry.tran: 盛气凌人的;居高临下的
entry.def: If you say that someone is condescending, you are showing your disapproval of the fact that they talk or behave in a way which shows that they think they are superior to other people.

example.ex: I'm fed up with your money and your whole condescending attitude...
example.tran: 我讨厌你的钱，也受够了你居高临下的态度。

example.ex: They can be a bit condescending.

means.word_mean: 1. with condescension; in a patronizing manner;
